text: Bernard "Bunny" Carr (31 July 1927 – 19 September 2018) was an Irish television presenter. Carr was born in Dublin. He presented shows such as Quicksilver, Teen Talk and Going Strong on RTÉ.Mr. Charm School, IrishTimes.com; accessed 2 April 2017. In 1973, Carr founded Carr Communications a public relations and communications training company, the first of its kind in Ireland.The Irish Examiner , tcm.ie; accessed 2 April 2017. Carr died of respiratory failure on 19 September 2018 in Dublin, aged 91. ==References== ==Other websites== *A discussion of "Quicksilver" Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Irish television personalities Category:People from Dublin
title: Bunny Carr
